name: 翁文慧
objective: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
schedule:
1. DNA structure and gene expression
2. Chromosomes in cells
3. Genes in pedigrees
4. Cell-based DNA cloning
5. Nucleic acid hybridization assays
6. PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis
7. Organization of the human genome
8. Human gene expression
9. Instability of the human genome: mutation and DNA repair
10. Physical and transcript mapping
11. Genetic mapping of mendelian characters
12. Genetic mapping of complex characters
13. Genome projects
14. Our place in the tree of life
15. Identifying human disease genes
16. Molecular pathology
17. Genetic testing in individuals and populations
18. Cancer genetics
19. Complex diseases: theory and results
20. Studying human gene structure, expression and function using cultured cells and cell extracts
21. Genetic manipulation of animals
22. Gene therapy and other molecular genetic-based therapeutic approaches
scorePolicy:
上課將以圓桌座談討論方式逐章進行
每一章節將由1-2位學員先作一詳解
其他學員再針對其現有的實驗經驗加以配合內容討論
本課程較著重分生臨床實驗室經驗與遺傳基因基礎知識的結合
因此對象以具備實驗室經驗之學員為主要考慮對象
評量標準：
學員解悉能力 30%
問題提問能力 30%
參與討論能力 40%
materials:
Human Molecular Genetics 3 作者：T. Strachan, Andrew P. Read (指定用書)
參考網路 Human Molecular Genetics 2 http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/bv.fcgi?indexed=google&rid=hmg.TOC
